home.title: Example TG MiniApp
home.description:
This is a simple repository that can be used as a starting point for your project.
The template is based on Vue.js and includes a UI library and an icon set. For convenience, the template uses an ORM client for PostgreSQL and MinIO as an S3-compatible data store, which can be further integrated with the database. FastApi is used to handle API endpoints, and AioGram (in Python) is used for interacting with the Telegram API.
home.hint: To check the API status, you can open the menu tab via the button on the dock or click the button.
